alert.note: Alert for Coosa; Shelby; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 5:25PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Talladega, northeastern Chilton, southeastern Shelby and western Coosa Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 525 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Wilsonville to near Thorsby. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sylacauga, Clanton, Columbiana, Wilsonville, Talladega Springs, Weogufka, Stewartville, Thorsby, Harpersville, Oak Grove, Lyle, Dollar, Gap Of The Mountain, Strickland Crossroads, Marble Valley, Moriah, Fayetteville, Mitchell Lake, Lay Lake Dam and Unity. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
